class CGOBRadioButton : public CGOBWidget

RadioButton is similar to button but a bit more complex.

This widget has a group ID value. All associated radio buttons use the same group ID. When a radio button is selected all other radio buttons are scanned for the same group ID and are deselected.

This widget draws a default radio button image created with inline array of values. For speed this should be superclassed with a class that uses a sprite image.

#include "gobradiobutton.h"
